3#ifndef KOD_MANAGEMENT_H
4#define KOD_MANAGEMENT_H
5
6#include <time.h>
7
8struct kod_entry {
9 char hostname[255];
10 time_t timestamp;
11 char type[5];
12};
13
14int search_entry(const char *hostname, struct kod_entry **dst);
15void add_entry(const char *hostname, const char *type);
16void delete_entry(const char *hostname, const char *type);
17void kod_init_kod_db(const char *db_file, int readonly);
18int write_kod_db(void);
19void atexit_write_kod_db(void);
20
21
22#endif
